MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY11 postcode area of Whittington, affecting properties in Penybryn Avenue, Ellesmere road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:18PM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 2:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:15PM on   21ST December 2020.
